page.title: 18SOME EXCITEMENTS
page.content: Recently the most important event has been the annual fete in aid of church and Village Hall. It takes place in the grounds of Ampney House with a bottle stall, dog show, cake stalls and other attractions. The 250th anniversary of the school was a great event with a lunch party for all people associated with the school including the Bishop of Gloucester. The opening of the cricket pavilion in 1969, and in 1979 the winning of the Lord Oaksey Bowl following a hat-trick by Mr Gearing in the final part of the match were things to remember. The biggest event of recent years was a dance and barbecue in the grain dryer to celebrate The Queen's Silver Jubilee. People flocked to a jolly evening from miles around. A barbecue and lamb roast will be held on August 24th this year.
